text: Aur (yaad kero) jabkay musa ney apni qom say kaha aey meri qom kay logo! Tum mujhay kiyon sata rahey ho halankay tumhen (ba khoobi) maloom hai kay mein tumhari janib Allah ka rasool hun pus jab woh log tairhay hi rahey to Allah ney unn kay dilon ko (aur) tairhaa ker diya aur Allah Taalaa na farman qom ko hidayat nahi deta
